column3: You forgot to git add the new directory, it looks like.\n

Since there's a reasonably clean separation of the wallet files, I'd prefer to build the objects in the subdir, same as qt and tests:

``` diff
diff --git a/src/Makefile.am b/src/Makefile.am
index 88e7af2..1ff3180 100644
--- a/src/Makefile.am
+++ b/src/Makefile.am
@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@ BITCOIN_INCLUDES=-I$(builddir) -I$(builddir)/obj $(BOOST_CPPFLAGS) $(LEVELDB_CPP
 BITCOIN_INCLUDES += -I$(src

@jonasschnelli sure, no problem if things slowly move that way, no need to try to do it all at once. Yes, tests are fine as you handled them imo. Eventually we can create a Makefile.wallet.include once it's more decoupled.\n

Rebased.

What if we merge this (has ACK from @theuni  and @laanwj)? This requires rebase often when getting out of date.
The makefile changes (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/5745#issuecomment-72989968) could be done in a upcoming PR.
